Title: Relates to the automatic reinstatement of public assistance following the completion of mandated residential drug treatment
Summary: Allows for the automatic reinstatement of public assistance following the completion of mandated residential drug treatment.
LawCode: Add ยง131-y, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to the automatic reinstatement of public assistance following the completion of residential drug treatment
